remarks: 'Less than' relationship between division and multiplication. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-May-2016.)
statement:
ltmul1d.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
ltmul1d.3 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR+ ) $.
ltmuldivd $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A x. C ) < B <-> A < ( B / C ) ) ) $.
